## [tidyorgs](https://github.com/brandonleekramer/tidyorgs) 

##### [tidyorgs](https://github.com/brandonleekramer/tidyorgs) is an R package that detects and standardizes organizations in unstructured text data {style=text-align:center}

![](/./packages_files/diverstidy_final.png)

## [diverstidy](https://github.com/brandonleekramer/diverstidy)

##### [diverstidy](https://github.com/brandonleekramer/diverstidy) is an R package designed for detection and standardization of geographic, population, <br>and diversity-related terminology in unstructured text data {style=text-align:center}

<center>
![](/./packages_files/ghost_hex.png)
</center>

## [GHOST.jl](https://github.com/uva-bi-sdad/GHOST.jl)

##### [GHOST.jl](https://github.com/uva-bi-sdad/GHOST.jl), short for GitHub Open-Source Tracker, is a Julia package <br>for targeted scraping of GitHub user and activity data

##### (I designed the hex sticker and helped write the paper for the package, <br>but didn't contribute to source code on GHOST.jl.)
